summary: This is a court subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, commanding Susan Shelling to appear and testify in the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell on November 29, 2021, at 40 Foley Square. The subpoena is signed by United States Attorney Audrey Strauss.

persons.name: Susan Shelling
persons.context: The individual commanded to appear and testify before the United States District Court in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case (20 Cr. 330 (AJN)) for which Susan Shelling is being subpoenaed to testify.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: The United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York who signed and issued the subpoena.

connections.description: Susan Shelling is being compelled to testify as a witness in the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell.
Audrey Strauss, as U.S. Attorney, issued the subpoena legally commanding Susan Shelling to appear.

events.title: Scheduled Court Appearance for Susan Shelling
events.description: Susan Shelling is commanded to appear in Courtroom 906 at 40 Foley Square at 9:00 a.m. to testify and give evidence in United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Subpoena Issued
events.description: The subpoena commanding Susan Shelling's appearance is dated and issued by U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss.

locations: 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York
One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Susan Shelling was subpoenaed to testify as a witness in the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330 (AJN)).
The subpoena was issued by U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss on September 15, 2021, for an appearance on November 29, 2021.
The document is a formal court order; failure to comply would constitute contempt of court and subject the individual to sanctions and penalties.
